style: whimsical and humorous, richly descriptive, strong imagery of food

location1.name: Plate Mountain
location1.overview: The starting point for the player at the edge of a large paper plate piled with food

location2.name: Breadstick Forest
location2.overview: A dense forest made up of crispy breadsticks

location3.name: Potato Salad Beach
location3.overview: A sandy beach of potato salad spread out before a lake

location4.name: Strawberry Gummy Lake
location4.overview: A sparkling lake made of liquid strawberry gummy

location5.name: Cookie Log Bridge
location5.overview: A bridge made out of cookie logs and frosting

location6.name: The Cheese Curl Caves
location6.overview: A network of mysterious caves formed by cheese curls

location7.name: Fruit Pebble Canyon
location7.overview: A colorful canyon filled with fruit pebble rocks

location8.name: Soda Bottle Valley
location8.overview: A narrow valley guarded by giant soda bottles

character1.name: Larry the Ladybug
character1.overview: A friendly ladybug with a passion for adventure

character2.name: Polly the Ant Queen
character2.overview: The wise and knowledgeable queen of ants

item1.name: Mighty Mustard Seeds
item1.overview: A handful of powerful mustard seeds that can boost your strength

item2.name: Gumball Helmet
item2.overview: A gumball helmet that offers protection from food-based adversaries

quest1.name: Mustard Seeds for Larry
quest1.overview: Find the Mighty Mustard Seeds and give them to Larry the Ladybug

quest2.name: Save the Ant Kingdom
quest2.overview: Find the Gumball Helmet and use it to help Polly the Ant Queen in her struggle against the Marauding Fruit Flies
